attributes.action: Prevent the automatic renewal of insurance policies at an increased premium
attributes.background: It is common practice for insurance policies to automatically renew at a higher price than the original premium. If  the policy is cancelled after automatic renewal there are fee penalties imposed. Customer confirmation should be required to renew insurance when the cost has increased over the year.

rejection.details:
Your petition seems to be calling on insurance companies, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.

Insurance companies are regulated by an independent regulator, the Financial Conduct Authority. You can find out more here:

https://www.fca.org.uk/firms/general-insurers-insurance-intermediaries
